pageTitle: House Judiciary Committee 112th Congress (2012 cycle): Member Money | OpenSecrets
textBeforeTable: See member profile] [ Totals by Sector to Sandy Adams (R-Fla) Since legislative decisions made by this committee affect a broad range of industries and interest groups more or less equally, the charts offer a general, graphic take on which sectors gave. The contribution totals listed here refer to the total dollars received by that member from all industries. (For committees with jurisdictions focusing on specific industries, only those "committee-related" industries are listed in this section.) 112th Congress (2012 cycle) Subcommittees Jurisdiction Top Industries Members Overview House Judiciary Committee Tweet Home / Politicians & Elections / Congressional Committees / Member Money Take Action Community Create Learn Resources Resources Newsletter Sign-up Campaign Finance Links Issue Profiles Center Press Releases OpenSecrets in the News Reports OpenSecrets Blog News & Analysis News & Analysis 527s Organizations PACs Revolving Door Lobbying Interest Groups
